issue.title: [C++] FIx doxygen warnings, include doxygen warning checks in CI linting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4307](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4307). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Doxygen has a bunch of warnings in 0.12 / master

https://gist.github.com/wesm/da6e7ba8cb6aa42875c4f3b98c6a9381

We should endeavor to maintain a clean Doxygen build

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4307?focusedCommentId=16749345) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3446
